Agent 8.0.0

Getting Started

To get started with Agent, you need to set up Elasticsearch on your localhost first. After that, start Agent with:

 ./agent -c agent.yml -e

This will start Agent and send the data to your Elasticsearch instance. To load the dashboards for Agent into Kibana, run:

./agent setup -e

For further steps visit the Getting started guide.

Documentation

Visit Elastic.co Docs for the full Agent documentation.
